import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { NavLink, useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../../context/AuthContext'; import './Sidebar.css'; const Sidebar = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const location = useLocation(); const { logout } = useAuth(); const handleLogout = () => { logout(); navigate('/login'); }; const isInInspections = location.pathname.startsWith('/inspections'); const [inspectionsExpanded, setInspectionsExpanded] = useState(isInInspections); // Sync expand state with URL location useEffect(() => { if (isInInspections) { setInspectionsExpanded(true); } else { setInspectionsExpanded(false); } }, [isInInspections]); const handleInspectionsParentClick = () => { navigate('/inspections/pending'); setInspectionsExpanded(true); }; return (
